channel.title: SSL on 乱世浮生
channel.description: Recent content in SSL on 乱世浮生

item.title: Haproxy虚拟主机SSL
item.description: Haproxy为多个域名配置SSL 生成自签名证书 1 2 3 4 5 6 sudo mkdir /etc/ssl/atbug.com sudo openssl genrsa -out /etc/ssl/atbug.com/atbug.com.key 1024 sudo openssl req -new -key /etc/ssl/atbug.com/atbug.com.key -out /etc/ssl/atbug.com/atbug.com.csr sudo openssl x509 -req -days 365 -in /etc/ssl/atbug.com/atbug.com.csr -singkey /etc/ssl/atbug.com/atbug.com.key -out /etc/ssl/atbug.com/atbug.com.crt sudo openssl x509 -req -days 365 -in /etc/ssl/atbug.com/atbug.com.csr -signkey /etc/ssl/atbug.com/atbug.com.key -out
